data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
In Bergamo, Nicolo Barella of Inter is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 1, Inter have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
Inter move into a 0-1 lead through a Danilo D`Ambrosio header.
That's a fine assist from Ashley Young.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Atalanta in the half of Inter.
The match at Gewiss Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Pierluigi Gollini, who is down injured.
In the minute 5, Can Inter get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
Throw-in for Atalanta at Gewiss Stadium.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Inter.
Gian Piero Gasperini (Atalanta) has taken off Pierluigi Gollini who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Marco Sportiello is the replacement.
In the minute 7, Atalanta needs to be cautious. Inter have an attacking throw-in.
Atalanta are caught offside.
Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Atalanta in the half of Inter.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Piero Giacomelli signals a throw-in for Atalanta, close to Inter's area.
In the minute 14, Ball safe as Atalanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Inter awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Inter to take a throw-in in Atalanta territory.
In the minute 17, Piero Giacomelli signals a Inter throw-in in Atalanta's half.
Free kick for Inter in their own half.
Ashley Young puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
In the minute 20, Roberto Gagliardini with an assist there.
Throw-in for Inter in their own half.
Throw-in Inter.
In the minute 23, In Bergamo Inter drive forward through Lautaro Martinez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Atalanta just outside Inter's area.
Stefan De Vrij (Inter) has received a yellow card from Piero Giacomelli.
In the minute 24, Papu Gomez of Atalanta gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Inter at Gewiss Stadium.
In Bergamo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 25, Atalanta's Berat Djimsiti has been booked in Bergamo.
Ball goes out of play for a Inter goal kick.
Free kick Atalanta.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Piero Giacomelli awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Atalanta.
In the minute 32, Ball safe as Inter is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Bergamo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Remo Freuler (Atalanta) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 33, Atalanta's Robin Gosens gets in a shot on goal at Gewiss Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Inter in their own half.
In the minute 38, Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Lautaro Martinez (Inter) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Lautaro Martinez is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Inter's Lautaro Martinez looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 41, Atalanta to take a throw-in in Inter territory.
Atalanta drive upfield and Mario Pasalic gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Inter defender.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
Throw-in for Atalanta at Gewiss Stadium.
In the minute 44, Rafael Toloi for Atalanta has been booked by Piero Giacomelli and receives a first yellow card.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Piero Giacomelli signals a Inter throw-in in Atalanta's half.
Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
Throw-in for Atalanta in the half of Inter.
In the minute 45, Can Atalanta capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Important block from the Inter defence as Papu Gomez fires in a strike for Atalanta.
The first-half is over at Gewiss Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
Inter's Nicolo Barella misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 47, Piero Giacomelli awards Atalanta a goal kick.
Inter push forward at Gewiss Stadium and Lautaro Martinez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atalanta defence.
Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Atalanta are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Atalanta in the half of Inter.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
In the minute 53, Inter have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Papu Gomez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atalanta.
In the minute 55, Piero Giacomelli awards the away team a throw-in.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Atalanta.
Marcelo Brozovic (Inter) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Inter in their own half.
Can Inter get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
Ashley Young (Inter) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 59, Can Inter capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atalanta's half?
The home team replace Timothy Castagne with Hans Hateboer.
Throw-in for Atalanta in the half of Inter.
The home team have replaced Mario Pasalic with Luis Muriel. This is the third substitution made today by Gian Piero Gasperini.
In the minute 61, Ruslan Malinovskyi is on a sub for Remo Freuler for Atalanta.
Can Atalanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Inter's half?
In the minute 62, Atalanta have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Inter in Bergamo.
Inter awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 65, In Bergamo Inter attack through Roberto Gagliardini. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bergamo.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
In the minute 68, Ball safe as Atalanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ruslan Malinovskyi (Atalanta) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Inter at Gewiss Stadium.
Throw-in Inter.
Inter make their first substitution with Alexis Sanchez replacing Lautaro Martinez.
In the minute 73, Piero Giacomelli awards the away team a throw-in.
Inter awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Inter to take a throw-in in Atalanta territory.
In the minute 73, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Inter close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Inter close to the penalty box.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
In the minute 76, Piero Giacomelli awards the away team a throw-in.
Antonio Conte (Inter) is making a second substitution, with Milan Skriniar replacing Alessandro Bastoni.
In the minute 78, Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Atalanta.
Cristiano Biraghi is replacing Danilo D`Ambrosio for Inter at Gewiss Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Atalanta in Bergamo.
In the minute 80, Duvan Zapata (Atalanta) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Free kick Atalanta.
In the minute 81, Alexis Sanchez for Inter is whistled offside.
Nicolo Barella of Inter smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Atalanta are coming forward and Robin Gosens gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 83, Goal kick for Inter at Gewiss Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Piero Giacomelli awards Inter a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Inter have a goal kick.
Inter are pushing forward but Romelu Lukaku's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 86, It's a goal kick for the home team in Bergamo.
At Gewiss Stadium, Samir Handanovic has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Atalanta drive upfield and Ruslan Malinovskyi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Inter defender.
Duvan Zapata (Atalanta) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
Ashley Young for Inter drives towards goal at Gewiss Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 89, Atalanta's Duvan Zapata gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Inter goal kick.
Piero Giacomelli will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Atalanta are pushing forward but Ruslan Malinovskyi's finish is wide of the goal.
Inter have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Atalanta at Gewiss Stadium.
Atalanta's Ruslan Malinovskyi breaks free at Gewiss Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Inter at Gewiss Stadium.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
Christian Eriksen is replacing Nicolo Barella for the away team.
Antonio Conte is making the team's fifth substitution at Gewiss Stadium with Victor Moses replacing Ashley Young.
The home team replace Papu Gomez with Jacopo Da Riva.
